categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic locations

nodes.text: Talrezan Four was a location affiliated with the Rebel Alliance during the Galactic Civil War. In 3 ABY, whilst rebel forces including the 61st Mobile Infantry escorted the Alliance Fleet out of the Mid Rim, Talrezan Four was lost. Captain Micha Evon of the 61st listed Talrezan Four alongside Hope Station and Unroola Dawn as recent losses suffered by the Alliance during the retreat in a meeting with his top staff.
Talrezan Four was mentioned in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
